text: A man had a dream and when he woke up, he went to a fortune teller and wanted him to decipher it. And the magician said to the man, Come to me with the dream that thou hast seen while thou wast awake, and I will make known to thee its interpretation. But the dreams of your sleep belong neither to my wisdom nor to your imagination. FIN
title: Sueños
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
